data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Goal! Hiroyuki Abe gives Nagoya a 1-0 lead in Nagoya.
Mateus with an assist there.
Kenta Nishizawa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Shimizu.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu attack but Renato Augusto's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 6, Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Throw-in for Shimizu at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Throw-in for Shimizu close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Shimizu have a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 19, Nagoya's Mateus is on target but unsuccessful.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Ryogo Yamasaki (Nagoya) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Shimizu.
Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shimizu's half?
In the minute 22, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu in their own half.
In the minute 25, Goal! Nagoya extend their lead to 2-0 through Naoki Maeda.
Ryogo Yamasaki instrumental with a fine assist.
Shimizu's Teerasil Dangda has run offside.
In the minute 28, Nagoya's Naoki Maeda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Minoru Tojo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Shimizu.
In the minute 30, Minoru Tojo signals a Shimizu throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 33, At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium, Shimizu are penalized for being offside.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Shimizu territory.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Shimizu.
In the minute 41, Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Free kick Shimizu.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Nagoya advance rapidly upfield but Minoru Tojo blows for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Shimizu drives forward and Keita Nakamura gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 46, Can Shimizu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Carlinhos Junior for Shimizu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Shimizu in their own half.
Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Ryogo Yamasaki (Nagoya) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 50, Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In the minute 52, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
In Nagoya Nagoya attack through Hiroyuki Abe. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
In the minute 53, Nagoya are pushing forward but Naoki Maeda's finish is wide of the goal.
Shimizu have a goal kick.
Throw-in Shimizu.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Shimizu.
Ball goes out of play for a Shimizu goal kick.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Minoru Tojo awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 59, Peter Cklamovski (Shimizu) is making a first substitution, with Junior Dutra replacing Teerasil Dangda.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
In the minute 60, Keita Nakamura of Shimizu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Peter Cklamovski is making the team's second substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Yuito Suzuki replacing Elsinho.
Mu Kanazaki is replacing Ryogo Yamasaki for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 61, The home team have replaced Naoki Maeda with Yuki Soma. This is the second substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Nagoya.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Shimizu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Shimizu, close to Nagoya's area.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Goal kick for Shimizu at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
In the minute 72, Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
Shimizu needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Yuichi Maruyama heads in to give Nagoya a 3-0 lead at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Great play from Mateus to set up the goal.
In the minute 77, Nagoya are in shooting range from this free kick.
Shimizu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Renato Augusto (Shimizu) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Nagoya are whistled for offside.
Massimo Ficcadenti (Nagoya) is making a third substitution, with Gabriel Xavier replacing Hiroyuki Abe.
The home team have replaced Yutaka Yoshida with Kosuke Ota. This is the fourth substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
Minoru Tojo signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 80, Hikaru Naruoka is on a sub for Keita Nakamura for Shimizu.
Shimizu have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 83, Shimizu have been awarded a corner by Minoru Tojo.
Junior Dutra (Shimizu) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Nagoya defenders.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Shimizu in their own half.
Minoru Tojo awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Carlinhos Junior (Shimizu) scores with a header to reduce the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 88, That's a fine assist from Kenta Nishizawa.
Joao Schmidt is replacing Mateus for the home team.
Corner awarded to Shimizu.
Shimizu are coming forward and Junior Dutra gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Shimizu.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Minoru Tojo signals a Shimizu throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Shimizu to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Minoru Tojo signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Shimizu's area.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
